publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3367# Robin Harper: Torness Nuclear Power Station—That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should request that Her Majesty’s Government seek an urgent and transparent investigation by HM Nuclear Installations Inspectorate into the recent failure of the gas circulators at Torness nuclear power station and give an assurance that the power station will not reopen if repair and consequent operation of the existing design could lead to a nuclear accident.
S1M-3367# Torness Nuclear Power Station (lodged on 9 September 2002) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3367# Robin Harper: Torness Nuclear Power Station—That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should request that Her Majesty’s Government seek an urgent and transparent investigation by HM Nuclear Installations Inspectorate into the recent failure of the gas circulators at Torness nuclear power station and give an assurance that the power station will not reopen if repair and consequent operation of the existing design could lead to a nuclear accident.Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
S1M-3367# Torness Nuclear Power Station (lodged on 9 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3367# Torness Nuclear Power Station (lodged on 9 September 2002) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-3367# Torness Nuclear Power Station (lodged on 9 September 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
